DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this registry is to evaluate the safety and performance of the ROX COUPLER in patients with treatment-resistant or uncontrolled hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Registry to Evaluate the ROX COUPLER in Patients With Resistant or Uncontrolled Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of resistant or uncontrolled hypertension must be made on the basis of current findings, medical history, and physical examination. Any serious medical condition that may adversely affect the patient's safety, limit the subject's ability to participate in the registry, comply with followup requirements, or impact the scientific integrity of the study.
